name: Induction Technology Group Ltd.
goal: A commercial manufacturing organisation making air filters for internal combustion engines and other applications specifically to achieve low air pressure loss or very long filter life. Also making the ducts and housings associated with air induction and filtration systems. The main markets are in motor-sport and engine tuning.
euInitiatives: Vehicle type approval. Vehicle testing requirements. End of Life Vehicle disposal and recycling requirements. Vehicle replacement parts requirements. UNECE requirements.
